      • AdvanceTimeSession

        public AdvanceTimeSession(IView cli,
                  ProjectHandler ph)
        Creates the advance clock session using the given UI and ProjectHandler.
        Parameters:
        cli - The command line interface.
        ph - The project handler.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Both the given view and the project handler need to be valid.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the use case by calling the advance time method.
        Specified by:
        run in class Session

      • advanceTime

        private void advanceTime()
        This method will show the user the current time and ask the user to enter a new system time in the future. Afterwards it will check the time and update all the appropriate object.

      • isValidTime

        private boolean isValidTime(org.joda.time.DateTime time)
        This method will check if the given time is a valid time.
        Parameters:
        time -
        Returns:
        Returns true if the given time is after the current system time, else it returns false.

      • updateAll

        private void updateAll()
        This method will update all the tasks.
